entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h near noon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 30 December 2022
